thread.title: Techs: phone warning spooks markets, ZTE slams US ban

title: Techs: phone warning spooks markets, ZTE slams US ban
text:
Techs: phone warning spooks markets, ZTE slams US ban 8:37pm IST - 01:48 
Smartphone worries unnerve the tech sector as the world's largest contract chipmaker warns of slowing demand and China's ZTE says a US ban on the sale of parts and software to the company threatens its survival. Pascale Davies reports.   
Smartphone worries unnerve the tech sector as the world's largest contract chipmaker warns of slowing demand and China's ZTE says a US ban on the sale of parts and software to the company threatens its survival. Pascale Davies reports.  //reut.rs/2qOgwGJ
